710 continue;

713 target = pUnit;
714 }
715 }
716

718 target = critterTarget;

721 onHostileAction(target);
722
723 return target;

3490{
3491 int32_t furthestPath = -1;
3492 int32_t furthestVisited = -1;
3493
3494 // Find furthest common polygon.
3495 for (auto i = static_cast<int32_t>(npath) - 1; i >= 0; --i)
3496 {
3497 bool found = false;
3498 for (auto j = static_cast<int32_t>(nvisited) - 1; j >= 0; --j)
3499 {
3500 if (path[i] == visited[j])
3501 {
3502 furthestPath = i;
3503 furthestVisited = j;
3504 found = true;
3505 }
3506 }
3507
3508 if (found)
3509 break;
3510 }
3511
3512 // If no intersection found just return current path.
3513 if (furthestPath == -1 || furthestVisited == -1)
3514 return npath;
3515
3516 // Concatenate paths.
3517
3518 // Adjust beginning of the buffer to include the visited.
3519 uint32_t req = nvisited - furthestVisited;
3520 uint32_t orig = uint32_t(furthestPath + 1) < npath ? furthestPath + 1 : npath;
3521 uint32_t size = npath - orig > 0 ? npath - orig : 0;
3522 if (req + size > maxPath)
3523 size = maxPath - req;
3524
3525 if (size)
3526 memmove(path + req, path + orig, size * sizeof(dtPolyRef));
3527
3528 // Store visited
3529 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < req; ++i)
3530 {
3531 path[i] = visited[(nvisited - 1) - i];
3532 }
3533
3534 return req + size;
3535}

501 else if ((*next_timed_emote)->type == 2) //emotestate
502 {
503 m_Unit->setEmoteState((*next_timed_emote)->value);
504 m_Unit->setStandState(STANDSTATE_STAND);
505 }
506 else if ((*next_timed_emote)->type == 3) //oneshot emote
507 {
508 m_Unit->setEmoteState(0);
509 m_Unit->setStandState(STANDSTATE_STAND);
510 m_Unit->emote(static_cast<EmoteType>((*next_timed_emote)->value)); // Animation
511 }
512
513 if ((*next_timed_emote)->msg.length())
514 m_Unit->sendChatMessage((*next_timed_emote)->msg_type, (*next_timed_emote)->msg_lang, (*next_timed_emote)->msg.c_str());
515
516 timed_emote_expire = (*next_timed_emote)->expire_after; //should we keep lost time ? I think not
517 ++next_timed_emote;
518
519 if (next_timed_emote == timed_emotes->end())
520 next_timed_emote = timed_emotes->begin();
521 }
522 else
523 {
524 timed_emote_expire -= time_passed;
525 }
526 }
